title: gtctrader
author: gtctrader
content: I created an account on cryptocurrency Exchanger ,and  made a deposit on wolebit.com  I immediately uploaded the required my personal documents I decided to withdraw  of the funds in the amount of $217after  KYC Completed! i can not Withdrawal  money  I submit ticket   on the site, support delete my ticket and after ,I contacted the support service on the telegram support  block my account Tony Robbins: @TonyRobbins_OfficialSupport: @ElizabethOfAdmintelegram channel   https://t.me/TonyRobbinsPump pleas help me how to attach file

comments.author: Potato Chips
comments.body: Website is inaccessible on my end. I dropped it in urlscan and same result: https://urlscan.io/result/b330c5e3-2bea-4fa2-94cf-9b7324abc04e/This is why you should stay away with new and obscure exchanges, they are likely to scam their users. If you whois wolebit, it's only 13 days old so it's likely that no one has ever heard of it therefore it has zero rep. I'd consider the documents compromised, I suggest reaching out to relevant authorities/companies.How to attach images: you can upload it to hosting websites like https://imgur.com/ and drop the links in your post.

comments.author: fennic
comments.body: Quote from: gtctrader on December 13, 2022, 05:20:23 PM  I created an account on cryptocurrency Exchanger ,and  made a deposit on wolebit.com  I immediately uploaded the required my personal documents I decided to withdraw  of the funds in the amount of $217after  KYC Completed! i can not Withdrawal  money  I submit ticket   on the site, support delete my ticket and after ,I contacted the support service on the telegram support  block my account Tony Robbins: @TonyRobbins_OfficialSupport: @ElizabethOfAdmintelegram channel   https://t.me/TonyRobbinsPump pleas help me how to attach file I think that this Op is new and he do not know that which exchange could be scam but now a days there are full proof at which time they can Scam with us. and there was a time when I made online wallet of Litecoin and later I deposited almost 20 dollars back in 2018. When I deposited and after some time when I want to withdraw he says you have to wait 7 days. And when I got back after er 7 days this website was gone. And that's why I avoid such kind of websites or exchanges. If you want to know which exchange could be better than you should got to https://coinmarketcap.com/exchangesThis wills how you which exchange is more trustable.

comments.author: fortunecrypto
comments.body: Quote from: gtctrader on December 13, 2022, 05:20:23 PM  I created an account on cryptocurrency Exchanger ,and  made a deposit on wolebit.com  I immediately uploaded the required my personal documents I decided to withdraw  of the funds in the amount of $217after  KYC Completed! i can not Withdrawal  money  I submit ticket   on the site, support delete my ticket and after ,I contacted the support service on the telegram support  block my account Tony Robbins: @TonyRobbins_OfficialSupport: @ElizabethOfAdmintelegram channel   https://t.me/TonyRobbinsPump pleas help me how to attach file Follow this format just upload the file on Imgur and we will quote but first include the story behind why you decided to pick this exchange when there are reputable and stable exchanges, what made you do that, we always tell people to only trade on  old and reputable exchanges but some people still pick recently launched exchange.Code:[b][color=black]What happened:: [/color][/b][b][color=black]Scammers Profile Link: [/color][/b][b][color=black]Reference Link: [/color][/b][b][color=black]Amount Scammed: [/color][/b][b][color=black]Payment Method: [/color][/b][b][color=black]Proof of Payment: [/color][/b][b][color=black]PM/Chat Logs: [/color][/b][b][color=black]Additional Notes: [/color][/b]
